attributes.action: force those absent parents who have court awarded access but don't come to see their kids to come to see them if the child wants to see the parent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the resident parent is forced to take a child to the arranged court ordered access but the absent parent does not have to turn up. It can be very distressing for a child when he wants to see the parent when this happens. Why should he be allowed to do this?
